{"id":413389182,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1603725054,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"76 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/413389182/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Champagne Tower","memory":"43.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double champagneTower(int poured, int query_row, int query_glass) {\n        vector<vector<double>> glasses(101, vector<double>(101));\n        \n        // function<void()> pour = [&]() -> void {\n        //     glasses[0] += poured;\n        //     for (int i = 0; i < )\n        // }\n        \n        glasses[0][0] += (double)(poured);\n        for (int i = 0; i < 100; ++i) {\n            for (int j = 0; j <= i; ++j) {\n                \n                double excess = max(0.0, (glasses[i][j] - 1)/2);\n                glasses[i][j] = min(glasses[i][j], 1.0);\n                glasses[i + 1][j] += excess;\n                glasses[i + 1][j + 1] += excess;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return glasses[query_row][query_glass];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"champagne-tower"}
